saukhya sewaye hruda roga prathikara sandaha nomile stetans labadima, hondama akshi kacha nomile labadima, welendapole athi akshi kacha 38 ka mila palanaya kirima, pilika roginta rupiyal laksha 15 k dakwa labadun prathikaraya jiwithanthaya dakwa labadimata katayuthu kirima, athyawashya aushadha 48 ka mila adu kirima. 1990 "suwasariya" gilan ratha sewawa dipa wyapthawa aarambha kirima aadiya apa gathawu wasara 03 thula saukhya sewaya wenuwen gath piyawara lesa handinwiya yuthuyi.

aashawa thrupthimath kara ganimata athi nohakiyawa winodaye mulashrayayi.ehidi sathuta labenne dukak lesini.me dhanawadi samaja kramaya poshanaya kirimata nam mese winodaya sampurnayenma nolabi yamak shesha wiya yuthuya.me aathmiya gataluwath dhanawadayath ekata galapime rahasa obata dan watahiya yuthuya.apage winodaya apa muna gahenne dhanawadaya wisin sapuranne nathi eseth nathnam dhanawadaya wisin laba nodi sitina sheshayataya.ese nam nagollagoda dharmasiri benadikta pidawen galawimata ida nodenne me dhanawadi kramaya nowa.ohugema awignyanayayi.ese nam ohu piditha panthiya udesa thama kawiyen karanne kumana wiplawayak wuwada eya arthawirahithaya.benadiklage awignyanika aashawa aththe dhanawadi samaja kramayataya.
